research_question: What is the single-qubit gate fidelity of Tuna-9's best qubit (q2, 1.6% readout error)? Does low readout error predict low gate error? This establishes a per-qubit noise baseline for interpreting all other experiments.
description: Randomized benchmarking on qubit 2 (best readout). 6 sequence lengths x 5 seeds = 30 circuits. Extracts average gate error rate via exponential decay fit.
